PDF Conversion Instructions

How to Convert HTML to PDF:

Step 1: Click the button below to open the checklist
Step 2: Use your browser's print function (Ctrl+P / Cmd+P)
Step 3: Select "Save as PDF" as the destination
Step 4: Save as "DWD_Property_Red_Flags_Checklist.pdf"
Step 5: Move the PDF to the /public/downloads/ folder
Open Property Red Flags Checklist
